title: Love Mission @

status: ラブミッション@ ; Love Mission at ; Love Mission@
description:
Description :
        1) Love mission Tomoe Karuma is an up-and-coming mangaka whose supervisor is Ero Magazine's Tanaka Atsuki. Though he imagined a cute girl named Tomoe, Tanaka is surprised to learn that in actual fact, Tomoe is a very geeky boy. Tomoe is a professional when it comes to creating sex scenes, but turns into a fish out of water when it comes to love. Tanaka offers to teach Tomoe all about love, but can the awkward mangaka learn about love in time to write about it? (From Blissful Sin) 2) Estranger! Ichi fall in love in pro wrestling because he fall in love in the wrestler Hawk. He doesn't have the physique to be wrestler himself so he is training his body while he's acting as a manager slash servant to the demanding & childish Hawk. 3) Tasogare Bayside City Chako was tired, hungry and bitten was he was picked up by Makoto and his father Yayoi like a stray cat, but will he become house·trained or will he go back to his old habits? 4) Sting & Slang Koutaro met Neko in his sister's photographing class. The good looking model and the cute boy became good friends but is there more than that? 5) On a Slave Kind and good hearted Kei could never ditch a friend in distress, that's his greatest virtue but also his Achilles' heel. 6) Just Us - Not scanlated 7) Freetalk & Omake - Not scanlated
